markdownRemark.html:
YAY!

Well, it works! Awesome!

I want to read a long line of text in this blog so I can decide is my blog design is good enough to be published.

frontmatter.title: An alternative to Rails `before_action`
frontmatter.description: Rails `before_action` is a good tool but often used incorrectly. In this article, I will show what is wrong and my remedy for `before_action` abuse.
